definition[0]: a strong feeling of shock and fear
example[0]: You should have seen the look of horror on his face.
example[1]: To my horror, I realised my shirt was wet with blood.
example[2]: Staff watched in horror as he set himself alight.
example[3]: Many people recoil with horror when they see a big spider like this.
definition[1]: something that is very terrible, shocking, or frightening
